about.title: Why we exist
about.section1: HB Advisory was founded by specialists in regulation, data and technology to turn public and private data into actionable decisions with safety and speed. We focus on industries that rely on compliance and competitive intelligence, starting with agro.
about.section2: We operate with documented pipelines, monitoring and infrastructure that supports growth without friction. Collaboration with client teams is key and we provide the materials needed so external partners can also contribute.
